059C64AB.Callback5Header: (Veteran) Complete the Cathedral of Light Capstone Dungeon

68161728.Phase3Description:
Complete the Cathedral of Light Capstone Dungeon in World Tier 2: Veteran to unlock World Tier 3: Nightmare.

In Nightmare, monsters give 100% increased Experience.

Sacred items, Unique items, Helltides, and Nightmare Sigils--used to unseal Nightmare Dungeons--become available in Nightmare and above.

D53BFF05.Phase0Description:
Visit the World Tier Statue in Kyovashad to unlock World Tier 3: Nightmare.

In Nightmare, monsters give 100% increased Experience.

Sacred items, Unique items, Helltides, and Nightmare Sigils--used to unseal Nightmare Dungeons--become available in Nightmare and above.
